dependencies.description:
aiofiles is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for handling
local disk files in asyncio applications.
dependencies.name: py-aiofiles

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description:
The Python keyring library provides an easy way to access the system
keyring service from python. It can be used in any application that
needs safe password storage.
dependencies.name: py-keyring

dependencies.description: A strictly RFC 4510 conforming LDAP V3 pure Python client library.
dependencies.name: py-ldap3

dependencies.description: Python ISO 8601 date time parser and data model/manipulation utilities.
dependencies.name: py-metomi-isodatetime

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper
dependencies.name: py-sqlalchemy

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: A Cylc plugin providing support for the Rose rose-suite.conf file.
dependent_to.name: py-cylc-rose

description: Rose, a framework for meteorological suites.
name: py-metomi-rose

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
